alert.note: Alert for North Bay Interior Valleys; North Bay Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Watch issued February 21 at 2:50AM PST until February 25 at 9:00AM PST by NWS Monterey
info.description: ...FREEZE WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE TUESDAY NIGHT THROUGH FRIDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 28 possible. * WHERE...North Bay Interior Valleys and North Bay Mountains. * WHEN...From late Tuesday night through Friday morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions could kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: North Bay Interior Valleys; North Bay Mountains
